description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mobile Shot Stance]

Your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reactive Strike], you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.
